ResearchProjectDef.label: bronze working
ResearchProjectDef.description: Mix steel with stone chunks to create slightly weaker metal in large quantities.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->discovered the alchemy of combining steel with stone to produce bronze, marking the dawn of a new era in metallurgy
subject_gerund->ushering in an age where metal becomes the backbone of progress and power

ResearchProjectDef.label: crafting bench
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a workbench for crafting simple things like clubs or bows.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->established crafting benches as the heart of production, where raw materials are transformed into tools and treasures
subject_gerund->carving the future with every crafted item, from the simplest club to the most precise bow

ResearchProjectDef.label: cement making
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct a cement press, which allows you to create extremely durable stone material out of stone chunks.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->innovated the creation of cement, turning stone into the durable foundation upon which empires are built
subject_gerund->laying the groundwork for enduring structures and monuments with the strength of cement

ResearchProjectDef.label: wood-fired crematorium
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a huge, wood-fired stone crematorium which vaporizes corpses with high temperatures.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->conceived the wood-fired crematorium, a testament to dealing with the departed in a manner that respects both cultural customs and sanitation needs
subject_gerund->embracing the cycle of life and death through the elemental purity of fire

ResearchProjectDef.label: tyrian production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create a tyrian farm - a river-bank structure that dyes cloth, which can then be extracted in the form of extremely valuable royal fabric.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->cultivated tyrian farms along the riverbanks, mastering the art of dyeing cloth into royal fabric, a symbol of wealth and status
subject_gerund->weaving the fabric of society with colors that command respect and admiration

ResearchProjectDef.label: road building
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct paths, dirt roads and stone roads directly on the world map, allowing for faster caravan travel.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->paved the way for civilization's expansion with the construction of roads, connecting communities and fostering trade
subject_gerund->tracing the arteries of trade and communication with each road built, propelling the civilization forward
